abstract: One of the oddities of Wall Street, Meredith Whitney’s third annual Halloween competition brought out all sorts of costumes, including one inspired by the Occupy Wall Street protests.
snippet: One of the oddities of Wall Street, Meredith Whitney’s third annual Halloween competition brought out all sorts of costumes, including one inspired by the Occupy Wall Street protests.
lead_paragraph: The cat is out of the bag.

headline.main: Halloween Is Once Again Meredith Whitney’s Day
